00031 /* creates the application's transactions gui form and data model. */
00032 TransactionForm::TransactionForm(const appSettings sets, QWidget *parent) : QDialog(parent) {
00033     /* store the application's settings. */
00034     this->sets = sets;
00035 
00036     /* create line edits and buddies objects for transaction fields. */
00037     vehicleEdit = new QLineEdit;
00038     vehicleLabel = new QLabel(vehicleLabelStr);
00039     vehicleLabel->setBuddy(vehicleEdit);
00040 
00041     customerEdit = new QLineEdit;
00042     customerLabel = new QLabel(customerLabelStr);
00043     customerLabel->setBuddy(customerEdit);
00044 
00045     startDateEdit = new EmptyDateEdit(QDate()); /* Null Date. */
00046     startDateLabel = new QLabel(startDateLabelStr);
00047     startDateLabel->setBuddy(startDateEdit);
00048 
00049     startTimeEdit = new EmptyTimeEdit(QTime()); /* Null Time. */
00050     startTimeLabel = new QLabel(startTimeLabelStr);
00051     startTimeLabel->setBuddy(startTimeEdit);
00052 
00053     /* create the navigation buttons. */
00054     firstButton = new QPushButton(firstButtonStr);
00055     previousButton = new QPushButton(previousButtonStr);
00056     nextButton = new QPushButton(nextButtonStr);
00057     lastButton = new QPushButton(lastButtonStr);
00058 
00059     /* create the management buttons. */
00060     completeButton = new QPushButton(completeButtonStr);
00061     deleteButton = new QPushButton(deleteButtonStr);
00062     closeButton = new QPushButton(closeButtonStr);
00063 
00064     /* add the buttons in a button box dialog. */
00065     buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00066     buttonBox->addButton(completeButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00067     buttonBox->addButton(deleteButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00068     buttonBox->addButton(closeButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00069 
00070     /* create the relational table model for the transactions. */
00071     tableModel = new QSqlRelationalTableModel(this);
00072 
00073     /* set the table to select. */
00074     tableModel->setTable("transacts");
00075 
00076     /* set a relation for the customer of the transaction. */
00077     tableModel->setRelation(Transaction_CustomerId, QSqlRelation("customer", "id", "name"));
00078 
00079     /* set a relation for the vehicle of the transaction. */
00080     tableModel->setRelation(Transaction_VehicleId, QSqlRelation("vehicle", "id", "reg_num"));
00081 
00082     /* select the transactions model in order to show the data. */
00083     tableModel->select();
00084 
00085     /* create a data widget mapper for the transactions fields. */
00086     mapper = new QDataWidgetMapper(this);
00087 
00088     /* set some operative options in the mapper. */
00089     mapper->setSubmitPolicy(QDataWidgetMapper::AutoSubmit);
00090     mapper->setModel(tableModel);
00091     mapper->setItemDelegate(new QSqlRelationalDelegate(this));
00092 
00093     /* add to the map the transaction GUI objects which manage the fields. */
00094     mapper->addMapping(vehicleEdit, Transaction_VehicleId);
00095     mapper->addMapping(customerEdit, Transaction_CustomerId);
00096     mapper->addMapping(startDateEdit, Transaction_StartDate);
00097     mapper->addMapping(startTimeEdit, Transaction_StartTime);
00098 
00099     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00100     connect(firstButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), mapper, SLOT(toFirst()));
00101     connect(previousButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), mapper, SLOT(toPrevious()));
00102     connect(nextButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), mapper, SLOT(toNext()));
00103     connect(lastButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), mapper, SLOT(toLast()));
00104     connect(completeButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(completeTransaction()));
00105     connect(deleteButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(deleteTransaction()));
00106     connect(closeButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00107 
00108     /* lock all gui objects (readonly, disabled). */
00109     lockGUI();
00110 
00111     /* if there are no transactions. */
00112     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) {
00113         /* focus the close button. */
00114         closeButton->setFocus();
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         /* select the first transaction in the model. */
00118         mapper->toFirst();
00119 
00120         /* focus the next button. */
00121         nextButton->setFocus();
00122     }
00123 
00124     /* create a horizontal layout for the navigation buttons. */
00125     QHBoxLayout *topButtonLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00126 
00127     /* set some geometry for the layout. */
00128     topButtonLayout->setContentsMargins(20, 0, 20, 5);
00129 
00130     /* add the buttons to the layout. */
00131     topButtonLayout->addWidget(firstButton);
00132     topButtonLayout->addWidget(previousButton);
00133     topButtonLayout->addWidget(nextButton);
00134     topButtonLayout->addWidget(lastButton);
00135 
00136     /* create a table grid. */
00137     QGridLayout *mainLayout = new QGridLayout;
00138 
00139     /* add the following objects in the appropriate position in the grid. */
00140     mainLayout->addLayout(topButtonLayout, 0, 0, 1, 4);
00141     mainLayout->addWidget(vehicleLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00142     mainLayout->addWidget(vehicleEdit, 1, 1, 1, 3);
00143     mainLayout->addWidget(customerLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00144     mainLayout->addWidget(customerEdit, 2, 1, 1, 3);
00145     mainLayout->addWidget(startDateLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00146     mainLayout->addWidget(startDateEdit, 3, 1);
00147     mainLayout->addWidget(startTimeLabel, 3, 2, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00148     mainLayout->addWidget(startTimeEdit, 3, 3);
00149     mainLayout->addWidget(buttonBox, 4, 0, 1, 4);
00150 
00151     /* set some GUI options for the table grid. */
00152     mainLayout->setRowMinimumHeight(4, 35);
00153     mainLayout->setRowStretch(4, 1);
00154     mainLayout->setColumnStretch(2, 1);
00155 
00156     /* do not allow to resize the form. */
00157     mainLayout->setSizeConstraint (QLayout::SetFixedSize);
00158 
00159     /* set the layout for the transactions form. */
00160     setLayout(mainLayout);
00161 
00162     /* set the text of the form's window. */
00163     setWindowTitle(tranWinTitleStr);
00164 }

00166 /* update any changes and close the form. */
00167 void
00168 TransactionForm::done(const int result) {
00169     /* update any changes. */
00170     mapper->submit();
00171 
00172     /* return from the form. */
00173     QDialog::done(result);
00174 }

00176 /* deletes the current selected transaction from the database. */
00177 void
00178 TransactionForm::deleteTransaction() {
00179     /* check if the are any rows in the model. */
00180     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) return;
00181 
00182     /* ask him/her if he/she wants to delete the transaction. */
00183     int r = QMessageBox::question(this, infoMsgTitleStr, deleteTransactStr, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No);
00184 
00185     /* if he/she don't want it just return and do nothing. */
00186     if (r == QMessageBox::No) return;
00187 
00188     /* get the index of the current transaction selected. */
00189     const int row = mapper->currentIndex();
00190 
00191     /* remove the transaction. */
00192     tableModel->removeRow(row);
00193 
00194     /* apply any changes. */
00195     mapper->submit();
00196 
00197     /* if it was the last transaction in the database. */
00198     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) {
00199         clearGUI(); /* clear the data from the gui objects .*/
00200         lockGUI();  /* lock all gui objects (readonly, disabled). */
00201         return;
00202     }
00203 
00204     /* select the appropriate transaction. */
00205     mapper->setCurrentIndex(qMin(row, tableModel->rowCount() - 1));
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* try to complete the transaction. */
00209 void
00210 TransactionForm::completeTransaction() {
00211     /* check if the are any rows in the model. */
00212     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) return;
00213 
00214     /* ask him/her if he/she wants to complete the transaction. */
00215     int r = QMessageBox::question(this, infoMsgTitleStr, completeTransactStr, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No);
00216 
00217     /* if he/she don't want it just return and do nothing. */
00218     if (r == QMessageBox::No) return;
00219 
00220     /* get the row of the current transaction selected. */
00221     const int row = mapper->currentIndex();
00222 
00223     /* get the record of the specific transaction. */
00224     const QSqlRecord record = tableModel->record(row);
00225 
00226     /* get the id of the transaction. */
00227     const int tran_id = record.value(Transaction_Id).toInt();
00228 
00229     /* try to get the id of the customer. */
00230     const int cust_id = getCustomerId (tran_id);
00231 
00232     /* if it was impossible to get the id of the customer ignore transaction. */
00233     if (cust_id < 0) return;
00234 
00235     /* try to check the card type of the customer and fetch it. */
00236     const int card_type = checkCardType (cust_id);
00237 
00238     /* if card is expired or detection error occured ignore transaction. */
00239     if (card_type == ErrorCardType) return;
00240 
00241     /* get the start-end date related data. */
00242     const QDate start_date(record.value(Transaction_StartDate).toDate());
00243     const QTime start_time(record.value(Transaction_StartTime).toTime());
00244     const QDate end_date(QDate::currentDate());
00245     const QTime end_time(QTime::currentTime());
00246 
00247     /* calculate time the vehicle exists in the parking. */
00248     const int time = calculateTime (start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time);
00249 
00250     /* calculate the charge of the transaction. */
00251     const double charge = calculateCharge (card_type, time);
00252 
00253     /* get both customer and vehicle names. */
00254     const QString cust_name(record.value(Transaction_CustomerId).toString());
00255     const QString vehi_name(record.value(Transaction_VehicleId).toString());
00256 
00257     /* try to perform the payment. */
00258     if (!completePayment(card_type, cust_id, cust_name, charge))
00259         return; /* in case of ignore transaction. */
00260 
00261     /* transaction has been completed.
00262        save in report the transaction. */
00263 
00264     /* show a message. */
00265     QMessageBox::information(this, infoMsgTitleStr, transactSuccessStr);
00266 
00267     /* store the transaction in the report for future reference. */
00268     storeInReport (cust_name, vehi_name,
00269                    start_date, end_date,
00270                    start_time, end_time,
00271                    charge);
00272 
00273     /* remove the transaction. */
00274     tableModel->removeRow(row);
00275 
00276     /* apply any changes. */
00277     mapper->submit();
00278 
00279     /* if it was the last transaction in the database. */
00280     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) {
00281         clearGUI(); /* clear the data from the gui objects .*/
00282         lockGUI();  /* lock all gui objects (readonly, disabled). */
00283         return;
00284     }
00285 
00286     /* select the appropriate transaction. */
00287     mapper->setCurrentIndex(qMin(row, tableModel->rowCount() - 1));
00288 }
00289 
00290 /* get the id of the customer. */
00291 int
00292 TransactionForm::getCustomerId (const int tran_id) {
00293     /* declare a sql query object. */
00294     QSqlQuery query;
00295 
00296     /* prepare a sql query with place holders. */
00297     query.prepare("SELECT cust.id FROM customer AS cust INNER JOIN transacts AS tran ON cust.id = tran.cust_id WHERE tran.id = :tran_id");
00298 
00299     /* bind values to the query placeholders. */
00300     query.bindValue(":tran_id", tran_id);
00301 
00302     /* execute the query. */
00303     query.exec();
00304 
00305     /* the customer's id (assume not found). */
00306     int cust_id = -1;
00307 
00308     /* try to get the first record. */
00309     if (query.next()) {
00310         /* get the id of the customer. */
00311         cust_id = query.value(0).toInt();
00312     }
00313 
00314     /* return the id of the customer. */
00315     return cust_id;
00316 }
00317 
00318 /* get the money from the card of the customer. */
00319 double
00320 TransactionForm::getCardMoney (const int cust_id) {
00321     /* declare a sql query object. */
00322     QSqlQuery query;
00323 
00324     /* prepare a sql query with place holders. */
00325     query.prepare("SELECT cust.card_money FROM customer AS cust WHERE cust.id = :cust_id");
00326 
00327     /* bind values to the query placeholders. */
00328     query.bindValue(":cust_id", cust_id);
00329 
00330     /* execute the query. */
00331     query.exec();
00332 
00333     /* the customer's card money (assume not found). */
00334     double card_money = -1;
00335 
00336     /* try to get the first record. */
00337     if (query.next())
00338         /* if the money card is not empty. */
00339         if(!query.value(0).toString().isEmpty())
00340             /* get the card money of the customer. */
00341             card_money = query.value(0).toDouble();
00342 
00343     /* return the card money of the customer. */
00344     return card_money;
00345 }
00346 
00347 /* charge the card of the customer. */
00348 bool
00349 TransactionForm::chargeCustomerCard(const int cust_id, const double charge) {
00350     /* declare a sql query object. */
00351     QSqlQuery query;
00352 
00353     /* prepare a sql query with place holders. */
00354     query.prepare("UPDATE customer SET card_money = card_money - :charge WHERE customer.id = :cust_id");
00355 
00356     /* bind values to the query placeholders. */
00357     query.bindValue(":cust_id", cust_id);
00358     query.bindValue(":charge", charge);
00359 
00360     /* execute the query (return true/false for success/failure). */
00361     return query.exec();
00362 }
00363 
00364 /* check and return the card type of the customer. */
00365 int
00366 TransactionForm::checkCardType (const int cust_id) {
00367     /* declare a sql query object. */
00368     QSqlQuery query;
00369 
00370     /* prepare a sql query with place holders. */
00371     query.prepare("SELECT cust.card_id, cust.card_date FROM customer AS cust WHERE cust.id = :cust_id");
00372 
00373     /* bind values to the query placeholders. */
00374     query.bindValue(":cust_id", cust_id);
00375 
00376     /* execute the query. */
00377     query.exec();
00378 
00379     /* the customer's card type (assume not found). */
00380     int card_type = ErrorCardType;
00381 
00382     /* try to get the first record. */
00383     if (query.next()) {
00384         /* get the card type of the customer. */
00385         card_type = query.value(0).toInt() - 1; /* for fixing with indexes. */
00386 
00387         /* get the possible card date. */
00388         const QDate date = query.value(1).toDate();
00389 
00390         /* if the card has date check if it is expired. */
00391         if (card_type == MonthCardType) {
00392             if ((date.daysTo(QDate::currentDate()) + 1) > 30) { /* plus the card creation day. */
00393                 /* show a message. */
00394                 QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cardExpiredStr);
00395 
00396                 /* card is expired, stop transaction. */
00397                 card_type = ErrorCardType;
00398             }
00399         }
00400         else if(card_type == YearCardType) {
00401             if (date.daysTo(QDate::currentDate()) > date.daysInYear()) {
00402                 /* show a message. */
00403                 QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cardExpiredStr);
00404 
00405                 /* card is expired, stop transaction. */
00406                 card_type = ErrorCardType;
00407             }
00408         }
00409     }
00410 
00411     /* return the card type of the customer. */
00412     return card_type;
00413 }
00414 
00415 /* calculate time elapsed between start-end dates and times. */
00416 int
00417 TransactionForm::calculateTime (const QDate start_date, const QDate end_date,
00418                                 const QTime start_time, const QTime end_time) {
00419     /* create datetime objects. */
00420     QDateTime startDateTime, endDateTime;
00421 
00422     /* set to datetime objects the appropriate values. */
00423     startDateTime.setDate(start_date);
00424     startDateTime.setTime(start_time);
00425     endDateTime.setDate(end_date);
00426     endDateTime.setTime(end_time);
00427 
00428     /* return the number of timeslices elapsed. */
00429     return startDateTime.secsTo(endDateTime);
00430 }
00431 
00432 /* return the charge for the transaction. */
00433 double
00434 TransactionForm::calculateCharge (const int card_type, const int time) {
00435     /* calculate the base charge. */
00436     const double base = (time * sets.chargePerTimeslice) / sets.timeslice;
00437 
00438     /* assume no charge first. */
00439     double charge = 0;
00440 
00441     /* according to the card type of the customer. */
00442     switch (card_type) {
00443         case NoCardType:
00444             {
00445                 /* charge him/her the base charge. */
00446                 charge = base;
00447                 break;
00448             }
00449         case SimpleCardType:
00450             {
00451                 /* charge him/her the base charge with discount. */
00452                 charge = base - base*0.1;
00453                 break;
00454             }
00455         case MonthCardType:
00456         case YearCardType:
00457             /* no charge. */
00458             break;
00459         case CreditCardType:
00460             {
00461                 /* charge him/her the base charge. */
00462                 charge = base;
00463                 break;
00464             }
00465         case ErrorCardType: /* in case of an error card type. */
00466         default:            /* this should never happen. */
00467             break;
00468     }
00469 
00470     /* format the charge of the transaction and return it. */
00471     return QString::number(charge, 'f', sets.chargePrecision).toDouble();
00472 }
00473 
00474 /* try to perform the payment of the transaction. */
00475 bool
00476 TransactionForm::completePayment(const int card_type, const int cust_id, const QString cust_name, const double charge) {
00477     /* according to the card type of the customer. */
00478     switch (card_type) {
00479         case NoCardType:
00480         case SimpleCardType:
00481             {
00482                 /* create the payment wizard. */
00483                 PayWizard payform (cust_name, charge, this);
00484 
00485                 /* execute the wizard form and return transaction completion status. */
00486                 return payform.exec() == QDialog::Accepted;
00487                 break; /* save for future bug. */
00488             }
00489         case MonthCardType:
00490         case YearCardType:
00491             {
00492                 /* accept payment because the cards have been tested before. */
00493                 return true;
00494                 break; /* save for future bug. */
00495             }
00496         case CreditCardType:
00497             {
00498                 /* get the money from the card of the customer. */
00499                 const double card_money = getCardMoney(cust_id);
00500 
00501                 /* if it was impossible to get card's money ignore transaction. */
00502                 if (card_money < 0) return false;
00503 
00504                 /* check if the customer can pay for the transaction. */
00505                 if(isLessThan(card_money, charge)) {
00506                     /* show a message. */
00507                     QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, notManyCardMoneyStr + QString("%1").arg(charge));
00508 
00509                     /* ignorn the transaction. */
00510                     return false;
00511                 }
00512 
00513                 /* substracts the money from the customer's card
00514                    and accept or ignore the transaction payment. */
00515                 return chargeCustomerCard(cust_id, charge);
00516                 break; /* save for future bug. */
00517             }
00518         case ErrorCardType: /* in case of an error card type. */
00519         default:            /* this should never happen. */
00520             break;
00521     }
00522 
00523     /* ignore the transaction in any other case. */
00524     return false;
00525 }
00526 
00527 /* store in report the transaction. */
00528 void
00529 TransactionForm::storeInReport(const QString cust_name, const QString vehi_name,
00530                                const QDate start_date, const QDate end_date,
00531                                const QTime start_time, const QTime end_time,
00532                                const double charge) {
00533     /* declare a sql query object. */
00534     QSqlQuery query;
00535 
00536     /* prepare a sql query with place holders. */
00537     query.prepare("INSERT INTO report (vehicle, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, charge, customer) VALUES (:vehi_name, :start_date, :end_date, :start_time, :end_time, :charge, :cust_name)");
00538 
00539     /* bind values to the query placeholders. */
00540     query.bindValue(":vehicle", vehi_name);
00541     query.bindValue(":start_date", start_date);
00542     query.bindValue(":end_date", end_date);
00543     query.bindValue(":start_time", start_time);
00544     query.bindValue(":end_time", end_time);
00545     query.bindValue(":charge", charge);
00546     query.bindValue(":customer", cust_name);
00547 
00548     /* execute the query. */
00549     query.exec();
00550 }

00553 void
00554 TransactionForm::lockGUI() {

00556     vehicleEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00557     startDateEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00558     startTimeEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00559 }

00561 /* unlock (editable, enable) the gui objects. */
00562 void
00563 TransactionForm::unlockGUI() {
00564     customerEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00565     vehicleEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00566     startDateEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00567     startTimeEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00568 }

00575     startDateEdit->clear();
00576     startTimeEdit->clear();
